title: New feature created to artificially boost their metrics
text:
In the latest update, they‚Äôve included a feature where you no longer can see a preview of the message on your Lock Screen, thus forcing you into the app to view any content whatsoever. 

This artificially will boost their user sessions and overall user time in app, where it hadn‚Äôt before but is a significant detriment to the overall user experience.

There seems to be no way in settings to revert it to previously, and as a result has me looking for alternative mail apps.

title: Oops!  Something went wrong!
text:
For the past month or so, I have had the gmail page go black and the only way I can fix it is to delete the app and redownload it! What‚Äôs going on? Don‚Äôt try to blame my internet source because this only happens with gmail! Fix it please!
After hearing from gmail support on how to take care of the problem, I‚Äôve upgraded my review.  However, it‚Äôs only been 2 days with no problems.  I hope it continues.  Thank you support.

title: No customized dark mode setting

title: More issues with Gmail than Hotmail
text:
I decided to start using Gmail on my iPhone for personal emails instead of Hotmail, but have encountered problems using it that I‚Äôve never had with Hotmail. 
First, when composing an email, you can‚Äôt swipe it down to refer to another email in your inbox. You have to copy what you‚Äôve typed, tap X to cancel the new email, look at the other email to get your information and then start your email over again by pasting onto a new email because it often doesn‚Äôt save the draft of the email I started.
Second, it‚Äôs more difficult to copy a photo in the body of your email or add as an attachment. Sometimes it will do neither and ask to add it as a file or on Google Drive.
Third, and most importantly, it seems to have nowhere near the storage capacity as Hotmail. I‚Äôve used Hotmail for over ten years and never had a notification that I was running out of storage and that I should buy more. I‚Äôve only used Gmail for about five years and I‚Äôm getting the notification that I have 83% of my storage used. I also have Google Photos app, so that may have contributed to that, but I have a number of photos and recordings on Hotmail too. The storage issue is the reason I am going back to Hotmail.

title: Previews stopped showing
text:
I‚Äôve always had my email previews showing so when notifications come through it shows a preview of the email and who it‚Äôs from etc. But recently they stopped showing whether my phone is locked or unlocked. I double checked my apple settings and they show to allow previews ‚Äúalways‚Äù and yet I still get no previews. 

PLEASE FIX THIS BUG. I get 100+ emails per day over multiple accounts, having to unlock my phone, then open the app, then switch email accounts JUST to find what was recently sent to me, is VERY inconvenient.
